amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Office of Inspector General by $11.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the Office of Inspector General by $11,500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 220 (Roll no. 219).
